value.title: StarCraft 2: INSANE GAME - Mass Tactical Nukes! (Maru vs Zest)
value.excerpt: Another amazing game of top-level StarCraft 2. This time around it is time for a Terran versus Protoss that goes to the late game. value.title: StarCraft 2: SERRAL vs CURE! (Best-of-5)
value.excerpt: A best-of-5 series of top level StarCraft 2 between Serral and Cure, the current number 1 and 2 on Aligulac. value.title: StarCraft 2: Goblin MASSES PHOENIXES vs Reynor! (Best-of-3)
value.excerpt: Phoenixes are not a very common unit currently at the professional level of StarCraft 2 in the Zerg versus Protoss matchup. We see them from time to time, but these days it is all about Void Rays and Carriers. In this video I cast a best-of-3 series of Zerg versus Protoss between Reynor and Goblin.
